column4: Hey... is there an easy way to switch from Ubuntu to Kubuntu? (not wanting to start the "which one is better" discussion. Just have some apps - Quanta f.e. - that seem to be working better on KDE)
Install kubuntu-desktop and be able to select which one at boot..
well... atm I'm already running a minimal leftover from my XP ... just kinda lacking space to install another boot...
It isnt another boot.per say.. it is a collection of apps and an option where you noprmally login to ubuntu
